def Load(widget): entity = widget.Entity
if entity == None: return if not(entity.Fields["COTACAO"].Handle.Value > 0): return
import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes")
from Benner.Corporativo.Definicoes.Suprimentos import CPRequisicaoCotacao
widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = CPRequisicaoCotacao.PodeIncluirCotacao(entity.Fields["COTACAO"].Handle.Value, entity.Fields["FILIAL"].Handle.Value) widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = CPRequisicaoCotacao.PodeAlterarCotacao(entity.Fields["STATUS"].Value, entity.Fields["STATUSDIGITARODADA"].Value, entity.Fields["COTACAO"].Handle.Value) widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = CPRequisicaoCotacao.PodeExcluirCotacao(entity.Fields["STATUS"].Value, entity.Fields["STATUSDIGITARODADA"].Value, entity.Fields["COTACAO"].Handle.Value, entity.Fields["FILIAL"].Handle.Value)
if entity.EhCotacaoPortalFornecedores: widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = False widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = False
